title: Apify
description:
Meet the full-stack platform for web scraping, data extraction, and automation. Built by developers for developers.

🏪 Apify Store
Over 1,100 pre-built Actors for web scraping or automation projects. Scrape social media, Google Maps, Google Search, and YouTube, or get data for generative AI.

👨‍💻 Develop with open-source tools
Simplify scraping with Crawlee, our popular open-source library for building reliable scrapers in Node.js. Or use the new Apify Python SDK.
